name: schedule
description: Simple alexa skill for exposing the devcon schedule
author: David Schmitz

scripts.test: lab -r console -o stdout -r html -o build/report/coverage.html -r lcov -o build/report/lcov.info
scripts.prepare.package: pushd build/tmp && cp -rf ../../package.json ../../src/* . && npm i --production && popd
scripts.package: npm run prepare.package && pushd build/tmp && zip -r -1 ../skill.zip * && popd
scripts.update.lambda: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name devconSchedule --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build/skill.zip
scripts.invoke.getnexttalk.remote: aws lambda invoke --function-name devconSchedule --region eu-west-1 --payload file://test/getnexttalkevent.json out.json
scripts.invoke.getschedule.remote: aws lambda invoke --function-name devconSchedule --region eu-west-1 --payload file://test/getscheduleevent.json out.json
scripts.invoke.getnexttalk.local: npm run prepare.package &&  cp sam/* build/tmp && cd build/tmp && sam local invoke --template template.yaml -e ../../test/getnexttalkevent.json devconSchedule
scripts.invoke.getschedule.local: npm run prepare.package &&  cp sam/* build/tmp && cd build/tmp && sam local invoke --template template.yaml -e ../../test/getscheduleevent.json devconSchedule
scripts.invoke.launch.local: npm run prepare.package &&  cp sam/* build/tmp && cd build/tmp && sam local invoke --template template.yaml -e ../../test/launchevent.json devconSchedule
scripts.deploy: npm test && npm run clean && npm run package && npm run update.lambda && npm run invoke.remote
scripts.upload.schedule: aws s3 cp --region eu-west-1 --acl public-read s3/schedule.json s3://dschmitz/devcon/schedule/
scripts.create.api.lambda: npm run package && aws lambda create-function --function-name DevconScheduleApi --runtime nodejs6.10 --region eu-west-1 --role arn:aws:iam::604370441254:role/basic-lambda-logging-permissions --handler schedule.handler --zip-file fileb://build/skill.zip
scripts.update.api.lambda: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name DevconScheduleApi --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build/skill.zip
scripts.invoke.api.lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name DevconScheduleApi --region eu-west-1 out.json
